title: The Ruinous Descent of Stars
data:

| ---------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                                      | [morning star](/wiki/Morning_star "Morning star")                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |

| To-hit bonus                                   | **+1d8**                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| Bonus versus                                   | all monsters                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |

- [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)")
- drow [Healer](/wiki/Healer "Healer")
- drow [Noble](/wiki/Noble "Noble") |

| Weight                                         | [80](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| Material                                       | [metal](/wiki/Metal "Metal")                                                                                                                                                                                               |

**The Ruinous Descent of Stars** is an [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). It is an [intelligent artifact](/wiki/Intelligent_artifact "Intelligent artifact") that is [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") and [drow-favoring](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)"), and its base item is a [morning star](/wiki/Morning_star "Morning star") made of [silvered](/wiki/Silver "Silver") [metal](/wiki/Metal "Metal").

## Generation

The Ruinous Descent of Stars is the chaotic [crowning](/wiki/Crowning "Crowning") gift for male drow [Nobles](/wiki/Noble "Noble") and drow [Healers](/wiki/Healer "Healer").

## Description

The Ruinous Descent of Stars has +1 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") and deals double damage, and always gains double the [strength](/wiki/Strength "Strength") bonus for damage as if it were a [two-handed](/wiki/Two-handed "Two-handed") weapon (e.g., up to +16 at 25 strength, instead of +8). While carried, The Ruinous Descent of Stars grants [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance").

The Ruinous Descent of Stars has several effects related to [sanity](/wiki/Sanity "Sanity") and [insight](/wiki/Insight "Insight"):

- At less than 100 sanity, The Ruinous Descent of Stars deals extra [acid](/wiki/Acid "Acid") damage equal to 2d(sanity lost / 4), with a cap of 2d12 at 52 sanity or less; with [clear thoughts](/wiki/Clear_thoughts "Clear thoughts"), this is reduced to +1d12.
- At 6+ insight, The Ruinous Descent of Stars deals +1d6 [fire](/wiki/Fire "Fire") damage for every 6 insight, up to +6d6 fire damage at 36+ insight.
- At 42+ insight, The Ruinous Descent of Stars may summon falling stars on a hit that are centered on a singular random point somewhere on the level - the falling stars cause up to 6 physical-damage explosions & 6 fiery explosions that deal 6d6 damage each. The odds and maximum number of explosions rises with insight, always triggering and causing up to 7 explosions at 72+ insight 72+.

[Invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") The Ruinous Descent of Stars causes up to 1d4 (1d(level⁄10 + 1)) clusters of fiery explosions and earthquakes at random places on the current level.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=The_Ruinous_Descent_of_Stars\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

The Ruinous Descent of Stars

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
)   The Ruinous Descent of Stars   (No tile)
Base item morning star
Damage vs. small 2d6 +1d12
Damage vs. large 1d8+1 +1d12

  • earthquakes
Base price 8000 zm
Weight 80
Material metal

The Ruinous Descent of Stars is an artifact weapon that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack. It is an intelligent artifact that is chaotic and drow-favoring, and its base item is a morning star made of silvered metal.

Generation

The Ruinous Descent of Stars is the chaotic crowning gift for male drow Nobles and drow Healers.

Description

The Ruinous Descent of Stars has +1 to-hit and deals double damage, and always gains double the strength bonus for damage as if it were a two-handed weapon (e.g., up to +16 at 25 strength, instead of +8). While carried, The Ruinous Descent of Stars grants magic resistance.

The Ruinous Descent of Stars has several effects related to sanity and insight:

  • At less than 100 sanity, The Ruinous Descent of Stars deals extra acid damage equal to 2d(sanity lost / 4), with a cap of 2d12 at 52 sanity or less; with clear thoughts, this is reduced to +1d12.
  • At 6+ insight, The Ruinous Descent of Stars deals +1d6 fire damage for every 6 insight, up to +6d6 fire damage at 36+ insight.
  • At 42+ insight, The Ruinous Descent of Stars may summon falling stars on a hit that are centered on a singular random point somewhere on the level - the falling stars cause up to 6 physical-damage explosions & 6 fiery explosions that deal 6d6 damage each. The odds and maximum number of explosions rises with insight, always triggering and causing up to 7 explosions at 72+ insight 72+.

Invoking The Ruinous Descent of Stars causes up to 1d4 (1d(level⁄10 + 1)) clusters of fiery explosions and earthquakes at random places on the current level.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
